sources.title: Bells of San Angelo (1947)
sources.description: Gridley is mining silver from an old Mexican mine and bringing it into the USA thru a passage into his worthless mine. Border guard Rogers suspects Gridley and finally finds the secret entrance to the Mexican mine. He sends Lee Madison for help only to have her captured by Gridley. Trigger brings help that takes care of Gridley's men and now Roy has to rescue Madison. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/bells-of-san-angelo-1947/

sources.title: Bells of San Angelo
sources.description: Along the Mexican border, Roy joins Western novelist Dale in a search for smugglers.

sources.title: Bells of San Angelo (1947) Roy Rogers & Dale Evans | Classic Western Color Movie
sources.description:
Along the Mexican border, Roy joins Western novelist Dale in a search for smugglers. They discover a silver mine.

Director: William Witney
Writers: Paul Gangelin, Sloan Nibley 
Stars: Roy Rogers, Trigger, Dale Evans
Genres: Classics, Musical, Western

sources.title: Bells Of San Angelo Full Movie Roy Rogers, Trigger, Dale Evans, Andy Devine, John Mc Guire
sources.description: Cowboy Roy Rogers (Roy Rogers) travels to Rancho San Angelo, a territory on the American-Mexican border, to help Cookie Bullfincher (Andy Devine) investigate some mysterious deaths around a silver mine. Roy's suspicion of mine manager Gus Ulrich (David Sharpe) is shaken by the unexpected arrival of  Western author Lee Madison (Dale Evans), who advises Roy to read one of her books to help him solve the murders. Meanwhile, Cookie follows Ulrich to the mine and discovers a complex scheme.

metadata.Plot: Gridley is mining silver from an old Mexican mine and bringing it into the USA thru a passage into his worthless mine. Border guard Rogers suspects Gridley and finally finds the secret entrance to the Mexican mine. He sends Lee Madison for help only to have her captured by Gridley. Trigger brings help that takes care of Gridley's men and now Roy has to rescue Madison.
